Actions.Name: White Strings
Actions.AreaEffect: All allies in range are teleported 2 in any direction.

Actions.Name: Black Strings
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is sealed and must save. On a failed save, they teleport up to 3 spaces. If they end this teleport adjacent to one or more or their allies, those allies take 4 damage from the target.

Actions.Name: Hasten Life's Thread
Actions.Description: A [name] in range 6 is marked. While marked, they are intangible, deal bonus damage, and gain +1 action, but unravel into multicolored string and are defeated at the end of the round.
